title: Display of number of emails in folder
content: In older versions of TB there was a display of how many emails were in the folder you were looking at. It is no longer there in 115. Is that a setting? How can I see that information, I found it really helpful. thanks much, todd

title: Open in Conversation not an option
content:
I frequently use "conversation" mode to look back and where I'm at on a work project. 115 changed where I select that....ok I can roll with that. Now it is on the right click menu of an email. I recently transferred a large number of emails from 2022, ~5000, from my inbox to another box I created. I've done this every year for a long time.

Problem is that for this recent group of emails from 2022, none of them have the ability to right click and choose "Open Message in Conversation". It's there for every other folder except this new one I created. Any help would be appreciated. thanks, todd
